summary: This is a brief email correspondence forwarding Judge Alison Nathan's sealed opinion regarding a protective order issue in case 20cr330, referencing the Martindell and Chemical Bank cases. It appears to be legal communication between parties involved in the Epstein-related proceedings.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: Issued a sealed opinion on a protective order issue in case 20cr330, which is being referenced in this correspondence.

events.title: Sealed Opinion Issued
events.description: Judge Nathan issued a sealed opinion regarding a protective order issue in case 20cr330.

events.title: Email Forwarding Opinion
events.description: An email was sent forwarding Judge Nathan's sealed opinion and referencing relevant legal cases.

keyFacts: Judge Alison Nathan issued a sealed opinion on June 25, 2021, regarding a protective order in case 20cr330.
The email correspondence references the legal cases Martindell and Chemical Bank as being discussed in Judge Nathan's opinion.
This document shows ongoing legal proceedings and protective order issues in the Epstein case as of September 2021.
